languages.text: {n}Соломон, хмуро зыркая на вас, тяжело опускается на колени. Чудовищным усилием он склоняет жесткую шею и глухо произносит:{/n} "Я извиняюсь на коленях, как положено. Я повел себя недостойно и заслуживаю этого".

{n}Solomorne, frowning at you, sinks heavily to his knees. With a titanic effort, he bows his stiff neck and murmurs,{/n} "I apologise on my knees, as I should. I behaved unworthily and I deserve it."
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон, хмуро зыркая на вас, тяжело опускается на колени. Чудовищным усилием он склоняет жесткую шею и глухо произносит:{/n} "Я извиняюсь на коленях, как положено. Я повел себя недостойно и заслуживаю этого".

{n}Solomorne, frowning at you, sinks heavily to his knees. With a titanic effort, he bows his stiff neck and murmurs,{/n} "I apologise on my knees, as I should. I behaved unworthily and I deserve it."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne se laisse lourdement tomber à genoux en fronçant les sourcils. Au prix d'un effort titanesque, il baisse la tête et murmure :{/n} « Je vous présente mes excuses à genoux, comme il se doit. Mon comportement indigne n'en mérite pas moins. »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, frowning at you, sinks heavily to his knees. With a titanic effort, he bows his stiff neck and murmurs,{/n} "I apologise on my knees, as I should. I behaved unworthily and I deserve it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne se laisse lourdement tomber à genoux en fronçant les sourcils. Au prix d'un effort titanesque, il baisse la tête et murmure :{/n} « Je vous présente mes excuses à genoux, comme il se doit. Mon comportement indigne n'en mérite pas moins. »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンは眉をひそめながらあなたを見つめ、重々しく膝をついた。凍りついたような首を必死に曲げ、彼はかすかに呟いた。{/n}「当然のこととして、こうして膝をついて謝罪します。私は卑劣なふるまいをしました。その報いを受けるべきです」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, frowning at you, sinks heavily to his knees. With a titanic effort, he bows his stiff neck and murmurs,{/n} "I apologise on my knees, as I should. I behaved unworthily and I deserve it."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンは眉をひそめながらあなたを見つめ、重々しく膝をついた。凍りついたような首を必死に曲げ、彼はかすかに呟いた。{/n}「当然のこととして、こうして膝をついて謝罪します。私は卑劣なふるまいをしました。その報いを受けるべきです」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, frunciendo el ceño, se arrodilla lentamente. Con un gran esfuerzo, inclina su rígido cuello y murmura:{/n} «Me disculpo de rodillas, como debería. Me comporté de forma indigna y lo merezco».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, frowning at you, sinks heavily to his knees. With a titanic effort, he bows his stiff neck and murmurs,{/n} "I apologise on my knees, as I should. I behaved unworthily and I deserve it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, frunciendo el ceño, se arrodilla lentamente. Con un gran esfuerzo, inclina su rígido cuello y murmura:{/n} «Me disculpo de rodillas, como debería. Me comporté de forma indigna y lo merezco».

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙皱着眉头，看着你，随后沉重地跪了下来。他竭尽全力，终于弯下了僵硬的脖子，低声开了口。{/n}“我愿意跪下来道歉，这是我应该做的。我犯下了可耻的恶行，理当得到惩罚。”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, frowning at you, sinks heavily to his knees. With a titanic effort, he bows his stiff neck and murmurs,{/n} "I apologise on my knees, as I should. I behaved unworthily and I deserve it."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙皱着眉头，看着你，随后沉重地跪了下来。他竭尽全力，终于弯下了僵硬的脖子，低声开了口。{/n}“我愿意跪下来道歉，这是我应该做的。我犯下了可耻的恶行，理当得到惩罚。”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, kaşları çatılı hâlde dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor. Olağanüstü bir çabayla kaskatı boynunu eğip mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Sizden dizlerimin üzerinde özür diliyorum. Bunu hak ettim, zira layık olduğunuz saygıyı gösteremedim."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, frowning at you, sinks heavily to his knees. With a titanic effort, he bows his stiff neck and murmurs,{/n} "I apologise on my knees, as I should. I behaved unworthily and I deserve it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, kaşları çatılı hâlde dizlerinin üzerine çöküyor. Olağanüstü bir çabayla kaskatı boynunu eğip mırıldanıyor.{/n} "Sizden dizlerimin üzerinde özür diliyorum. Bunu hak ettim, zira size layık olduğunuz saygıyı gösteremedim."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne sieht dich an und sinkt schwer auf seine Knie. Mit großer Mühe neigt er seinen steifen Hals und murmelt: {/n}"Ich bitte auf meinen Knien um Verzeihung, wie es sein sollte. Ich habe mich unwürdig verhalten und meine Strafe verdient."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne, frowning at you, sinks heavily to his knees. With a titanic effort, he bows his stiff neck and murmurs,{/n} "I apologise on my knees, as I should. I behaved unworthily and I deserve it."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne sieht dich an und sinkt schwer auf seine Knie. Mit großer Mühe neigt er seinen steifen Hals und murmelt: {/n}"Ich bitte auf meinen Knien um Verzeihung, wie es sein sollte. Ich habe mich unwürdig verhalten und meine Strafe verdient."
